title: SHOTGUN TANTRA - Christopher S. Hyatt (2 CDs)
description:
Shotgun Tantra 
by Christopher S. Hyatt, Linda Miller and Nick Tharcher
MP3 FORMAT (2 CDs)
 <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1935150022/4353-20" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1935150022/4353-20</a>

Shotgun Tantra is a 2-CD set in which Dr. Hyatt presents effective Tantric methods by which you can change your self and your life! Each CD includes powerful and practical techniques which can be used alone or with a partner.

The first CD includes:
Introduction
Tantra & Anxiety
Tantra vs. Sex Magick
Psychologists
Physiology & Stress
Exercise 1: Pelvic Thrusting
Sex, Repression & Children
How Can Tantra Help Me?
Exercise 2: Pelvic Drop
Post Pelvic Rage
Exercise 3: Anal Flexing
Exercise 4: Counting
Closing Comment

The second CD includes:
Review of Exercise 3
Orgasmic Release
The Shadow
Review of Exercise 4
Adjunct Exercises
Love, Adventure & Creativity
